message:
Give a try to HangFire – a reliable way to kick off long-running processes from the ASP.NET request processing pipeline. Asynchronous, transparent, reliable, efficient processing. No Windows service/ Task Scheduler required. Even ASP.NET is not required. (from package description)  

* [http://hangfire.io](http://hangfire.io) – project page  
* [http://docs.hangfire.io/en/latest/tutorials/send-email.html](http://docs.hangfire.io/en/latest/tutorials/send-email.html) – Small tutorial related to sending mail in background.
